product_name: Columbia Skiff Guide III Polo Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Columbia Skiff Guide III Polo Shirt is a technical top crafted from a premium wicking polyester fabric that's comfortable for your multiday adventures outdoors. Polyester fabric provides UPF 30 protection from the sun. Omni-Wick(R) technology moves and disperses sweat away from you body for quick evaporation. Antimicrobial finish helps reduce odors. The Columbia Skiff Guide III Polo Shirt has a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Columbia Skiff Guide III Polo Shirt is a technical top crafted from a premium wicking polyester fabric that's comfortable for your multiday adventures outdoors.
